title: I wanna buy this bass guitar
body:
https://www.amazon.com/Ibanez-String-Guitar-Handed-GSRM20BWNF/dp/B00SMYGEBA/ref=sr_1_3?keywords=bass+guitar&qid=1558463755&rnid=2941120011&s=musical-instruments&sr=1-3

i used to play bass in a thrash metal band until someone stole my bass
